articles.title: PM Modi Takes Steps To Allow Yale, Oxford, Stanford To Open India Campuses - NDTV
articles.description: India has taken a step toward allowing leading foreign universities such as Yale, Oxford and Stanford to set up campuses and award degrees as part of an overhaul of the South Asian nation's higher education.
articles.content:
PM Modi's government is pushing to overhaul the country's heavily-regulated education sector
